content:
In part celebration of our 2nd founding anniversary, we gladly present a webinar featuring results and way forward of the CLAIRE Task Force on AI and COVID-19 on 15 July 2020, 11:00 AM CET.

Following the launch of CLAIRE Task Force COVID-19 on 20 March 2020, more than 150 AI researchers throughout Europe collected and curated resources which aimed to leverage AI techniques in the context of COVID-19 and to support the development of new projects in several application areas. Under this task force, seven major groups were formed working on mobility and monitoring data analysis; bioinformatics; medical image analysis; social dynamics and networks monitoring; robotics; and scheduling & resource management.

The webinar will focus on discussing three-month task force outcomes in the areas of AI for bioinformatics, drug repurposing, and medical image analysis. It will feature experiences and insights of Emanuela Girardi, Co-coordinator of CLAIRE and the COVID-19 Task Force; Giovanni Stilo, Assistant Professor, Department of Information Engineering, Computer Science and Mathematics at the University of L'Aquila; Andrea Beccari, Business Unit Head, R&D Platforms and Services of Domp√© farmaceutici SpA; Marco Aldinucci, Professor, Computer Science Department of the University of Torino; and Silvio Tossato, Deputy Head of Node ELIXIR-Italy.

To register, please visit https://clairecovid-webinar.eventbrite.com

[WEBINAR] CLAIRE Task Force on AI & COVID-19: Results and next steps
Join us as we learn from the insights of volunteer AI experts in Europe working on COVID-19 research initiatives in this FREE webinar.
